comments:
Using WTP 1.5 GM driver, I just tried to install the Geronimo plugin by
clicking "Do not see your server listed" link in Preference -> server ->
install runtime.  The message still indicated Geronimo 1.0 but I think it's actually the Geronimo 1.1 feature and plugin that's being refered to (see bug 149354).  The install failed with a message:

!MESSAGE Featureorg.apache.geronimo.feature org.apache.geronimo.featurecannot
be found onhttp://apache.sunsite.ualberta.ca/geronimo/eclipse/updates/
or a newer version is already installed.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.wst.server.core 4 0 2006-07-20 15:40:58.745
!MESSAGE Error occurred installing server: Could not download and install
update feature.
!STACK 1
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: Could not download and install update
feature.
 at
org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.InstallableServer.install(InstallableServer.java:166)
 at
org.eclipse.wst.server.ui.internal.wizard.NewInstallableServerWizard$5.run(NewInstallableServerWizard.java:120)
 at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.wst.server.core 4 0 2006-07-20 15:40:58.755
!MESSAGE Could not download and install update feature.

I can get the the URL:
onhttp://apache.sunsite.ualberta.ca/geronimo/eclipse/updates/
using a browser. 

This link used to be fine when I tried it in WTP 1.5 RC6 timeframe about a
month ago and I was able to install Geronimo 1.0 plugins successfully before.

Sachin indicated that it works ok using the update manager, so there's something
wrong with either the installable server ext point in wtp, or the installable
server code.
We need this fixed in WTP 1.5.1.

Created an attachment (id=46642)
patch for problem

This patches fixes the issue as there was a bug in the getLatestVersion method, I also changed the implementation to rid of the use of the deprecated PluginVersionIdentifier and used scrictly the Version class

Hi Tim,

Not sure if you get CCed automatically as component lead.  Please commit Sachin's patch at your earliest convenience.  Thanks!

Note from Kathy:
> Would it be possible for you to review and commit the patch Sachin provide for defect 151403 for this week's WTP 1.5.1 I-build?
> It's holding up a few of our FVT test cases.

Yes, it's already in HEAD and on track for this week's I-build.
Released for the next WTP 1.5.1 & 2.0 builds.
This is part of a "mass update" where bugs showing "fixed" between 7/1/2006 and 9/27/2006 are assumed fixed in WTP 1.5.1. feel free to change the target milestone if you know a more accurate setting.

traces.message: Could not download and install update feature.
